creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
Publishing a document does not update the index of Lucene. There also is no GUI 
to manually update that index.

Found in the default publication of 1.2RC6 on Windows 2000.

lucene indexing does not work at all on windows. i took a look and the effort to
implement it and it is simply too much for 1.2.1

in 1.4 it makes sense to scrap that code in redo in with cocoon cli
creator: gregor@apache.org

text:
it seems reasonable to use http://wiki.apache.org/cocoon/LuceneIndexTransformer
to create the necessary file for the lucene indexer. the lenya indexer already
creates these anyway.
creator: gregor@apache.org
gregor@apache.org
text:

text: In 1.4, the index is updated when a document is published.
